wf_workflow_version.description: Removes the adapter with is already present in the inventory
wf_workflow_version.name: Remove VPLEX ADAPTER
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Removes the adapter with is already present in the inventory
wf_workflow.name: Remove VPLEX ADAPTER

wf_stage.name: Initiate SNOW to VRO WF call
Set the value to Close Incomplete
set the value to closed successful

stage.display_value: Set the value to Close Incomplete

sys_variable_value.value: state=4^comments=The workflow didn't complete successfully. ^short_description=${workflow.scratchpad.error}^work_notes=Error is : ${workflow.scratchpad.error}^EQ
state=4^comments=The workflow didn't complete successfully. ^short_description=${workflow.scratchpad.error}^work_notes=Error is : ${workflow.scratchpad.error}^EQ

stage.display_value: set the value to closed successful

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^comments=The Request was completed successfully .^work_notes=Output is : ${workflow.scratchpad.output}^EQ
state=3^comments=The Request was completed successfully .^work_notes=Output is : ${workflow.scratchpad.output}^EQ
